name: Lost Temple (84ZS)
description:
This is the second game we made in our a-game-a-week challenge. Also, it's an entry for PIG Squad's Summer Slow Jam.

Use mouse to guide our little explorer in the map.

Follow the compass to reach where the forgotten temple located.

Be carefull of mine and spike, you only have 3 lives.

The number on a tile repesents how dangerous around. The lower it is, the more risky to move around.
